name: Custom shoes
description:
Before purchasing custom shoes please mail with
type of shoe
your shoe size
design ideas, drawing or description what you want on the shoes

Waterproof.
100% hand-painted.

Also it can take up to 3 weeks for shoes to be completed (it takes me about 2-4 days straight depending complexity of design)

At the moment its on sale as i now have a bit more free time and can take more order to be done quickly, but it won't be around for long.

options.name: Slip on Canvas Shoes (includes cost of shoes)
